game.name: Rescue Heli RH407
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: An arcade game with a retro vibe. Navigate a helicopter in 2.5D and rescue people waiting for transport. Don't overdo the aerial acrobatics -passengers might fall out! Land softly! And be quick -you're running out of fuel. The physical simulation of flight adds a modern twist to the retro gameplay.
game.shortDescriptionEn: An arcade game with a retro vibe. Navigate a helicopter in 2.5D and rescue people waiting for transport. Don't overdo the aerial acrobatics -passengers might fall out! Land softly! And be quick -you're running out of fuel. The physical simulation of flight adds a modern twist to the retro gameplay.
